If you believe this is incorrect, try:
• Running the application as administrator
• Checking if components were installed manually
• Using the 'View Report' button for detailed information
manage.uninstall_confirm: Are you sure you want to uninstall {component}?\n\nThis will remove all files, configurations, and registry entries associated with this component.
manage.danger_desc: Complete removal of all Sunshine-AIO components. This action cannot be undone.

This will completely remove ALL Sunshine-AIO components including:

• All installed software (Sunshine, VDD, Playnite, etc.)
• All configurations and settings
• All registry entries and system modifications
• All downloaded files

This action CANNOT be undone!

Are you absolutely sure you want to proceed?
